lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It's important to be kind and do good in this world and when one has good fortune it is a responsibility to spread it to others who need help.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people who want to make a better life for themselves and their families
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes medical products

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in dreaming and creating your own reality.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people keep their teeth healthy and clean.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others an opportunity to change their lives through a belief in their dreams and the necessary assistance to begin. We all need the support of people who believe in our dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I use my writing to help others heal their grief.

lenders.name: Kerri & Nicolas
lenders.loan_because: it gives people a chance to improve their lives and the lives of those around them.
lenders.occupational_info: We assist people in buying and selling homes.

lenders.name: Richardson Family
lenders.loan_because: It is our human responsibility
lenders.occupational_info: doctor

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed to be a blessing
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a husband, a father, a pastor and someone who has learned firsthand that it is truly a blessing to give.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Supervisor over contractor sales

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people better them self.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate...and as Margaret Mead said...a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. And I believe these borrowers are just the people to do that.

lenders.name: Hugh
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great organization that helps facilitate the entrepreneurial spirit in people all over the world.

lenders.name: Lea & Sonny
lenders.loan_because: We loan because everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Maritza
lenders.loan_because: I was watching the Ophra Show when she had President Bill Clinton and I was moved to tears when I heard him talk about KIVA.org and how easy would be to help someone in need.  I had to do it!

lenders.name: Meghan
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place for my son
lenders.occupational_info: I make medical devices that help repair shoulder and knee injuries

lenders.name: Owen
lenders.loan_because: I have prospered by working many years. I want to encourage workers.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked as a scientist in support of the US Civil service.

lenders.name: Kimberlie
lenders.loan_because: I can, and because I admire those out there with far less than  I have , who have the guts and iniative to get out there and become successful in their chosen field, no matter what.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a fortune 500 Diagnostics Lab.  I work in customer service and enjoy helping people who call in.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: the concept of joining  together with other people to potentially change people's lives is amazing and fulfilling.

lenders.name: Racheal & Eric
lenders.loan_because: We both feel its important to give back. Helping others succeed makes us feel so good!
lenders.occupational_info: Racheal owns an eco-friendly webstore, and Eric cooks for a small restaurant.

lenders.name: Drew & Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: We feel lucky to live in Canada, and want to help people who are not so fortunate.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: what better way to spend $25?

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to live in Canada and have a good job.  I think we should all give back to others!  I have already given 3 gift certificates to friends who have joined.  I also told my best friend about KIVA and she started a team.  It's AWESOME!!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a clinic setting and care for employees that get injured on the jobsite.  I also look after minor health needs such as tonsillitis, sore throats, colds, headaches, sprains, sore backs, etc......

lenders.name: Marisa
lenders.loan_because: making a difference and participating in a global community is important.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide sign language interpreting services in order to facilitate communication between people who can hear and people who are deaf.

lenders.name: Craig & Annette
lenders.loan_because: We absolutely LOVE giving.  We truely enjoy the joy it puts in our hearts knowing we're helping do God's work on this earth...he needs us to give from that which he has given us
lenders.occupational_info: We own a chiropractic clinic together.  Annette is the Doctor and Craig is responsible for Marketing and Public Relations.

lenders.name: Andrew Teague
lenders.loan_because: While I have had some very meaningful jobs in my career, It is a goal of mine to find an opportunity of a more philanthropic nature helping people around the world.  The microfinance model is revolutionary  and participating has given me part of what I have been seeking for some time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in computers, technology and the Internet.  I have previously worked for a bilingual public library for 13 years, and went on to become CIO at an international research non-profit organization.  I am now working with an international software development team.

lenders.name: Jeri
lenders.loan_because: I am able
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteer

lenders.name: don
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with a gift to work and know what it means not to be financially sufficient as well.
lenders.occupational_info: my work is very rewarding as I get to work with people and assist in their lives and projects as a builder.

lenders.name: joyce
lenders.loan_because: If I can help, then I should.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: in third world countries such a small amount of money can make a very big difference in a person's ability to provide for their family and I can follow the progress of my borrower.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 55 year young grandmother of 5.  I am in a transition phase; formerly earned a living as a corporate accountant.  I am exploring careers that incorporate more high touch than high tech :-D

lenders.name: Jundee
lenders.loan_because: I can help someone improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I  spend a lot of time on the computer.

lenders.name: MFMB
lenders.loan_because: After all my travels, I know how fortunate I am.  It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: London family
lenders.loan_because: Having started a business from scratch, I know first hand how difficult it is to get someone to believe in your dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: I own a retail stationery and gift store.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: "I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something; and because I cannot do everything, I will not refuse to do something that I can do." - Helen Keller

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others as I have been helped. I know the struggle it can be to raise a family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Material analyst for an auotmotive company

lenders.name: Jason & Sara
lenders.loan_because: We both have had the opportunity to live in 3rd world countries for extended periods of time and feel a connection with people living overseas. Loans like this really do change lives.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a doctor for children

lenders.name: Crystal
lenders.loan_because: Life is hard and it is a nice feeling to help someone achieve their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I cook for small children in a headstart program.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: I can...I want to put the money to good use and I can't think of a better way than by helping somebody who REALLY needs it.    : )

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to have so much as a citizen of the United States.  It is only right to share and help those less fortunate who are willing, wanting & capable of providing a better life for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I plan parties for corporations and individuals.  I also book entertainment for these events, as well as, planning the theme, menu, invitations, etc.

lenders.name: Wesley
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea that you can help someone help themselves.  If a friend was in need I would like to think I would do at least this much... so why not do this much in the meantime...?
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Apple... and have one of those lucky jobs where you get to travel...

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I have been struggling financially most of my life doing work that I enjoyed quite a bit but the jobs were low paying; I never could put any savings away but would donate if I could. Now that I have inherited a little money, I have been allowing my charitable, giving nature a chance to flower.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a bit of a gadfly. I sell books on Amazon.com and tutor elementary school kids reading and math skills. Formerly I worked in the hotel industry in San Francisco.

lenders.name: Glenn & Gail
lenders.loan_because: We've been blessed and think that micro-loans are one of the best way to help others.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy empowering people to make a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: It feels wonderful to help people in need help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people become more aware of themselves through the process of self-discovery.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: What goes around, comes around (I borrowed that from someone else, but I believe it's true).  I want to share the gifts I've been given with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse in an intensive care unit.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: we are all in this world together so we need to extend our hand to others

lenders.name: EILEEN  S.
lenders.loan_because: There are folks all over the world that can use a hand now & then.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.occupation: Client Service Mgr. at a Crisis Pregnancy Center

lenders.name: Tunda
lenders.loan_because: I Care

lenders.name: Roger Cunard
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites and write.

lenders.name: Chanikia
lenders.loan_because: I Love helping out people!!

lenders.name: Phyllis
lenders.loan_because: what a wonderful opportunity to give back to from a world of I HAVE.  i don't have much money but i have everything else and no children...am trying to pay it forward...
lenders.occupational_info: my work is volunteer these days...i take elderly folks to dinners and dances and otherwise help with meals on wheels or wherever i am needed.

lenders.name: Veronica
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to achieve and better their lives.  No one makes it through the world, alone.  We all have had help at one time or another.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a crafter and artist now.  I quilt, make dolls, paint, photograph, sew clothes & other items, and I write short stories.

lenders.name: Jannie
lenders.loan_because: I love to help those in need, I feel that helping others God will help us
lenders.occupational_info: Being a servant of God

lenders.name: sarah
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help to get ahead. My family is so blessed and happy to give.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I would not be where I am in this life without the help of others.  I want to make a difference in someone's life that is willing to work hard and has a plan for where their money will go, not just someone expecting something for nothing.  I respect all of the people featured on Kiva for being willing to make themselves and their families better by working toward their own business.  I believe I have been blessed in my life with many resources and if I can bless someone else by allowing them to have resources that mean something to them, I feel this is what I should do.
lenders.occupational_info: My goal is to become a doctor and work in many of the places around the world featured on KIVA, but currently I am in school to become a nurse practitioner.  This is very similar to a doctor, I can prescribe medicine, give medical treatment, and diagnose illness but I work under the supervision of another physician.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be able to make a good living
lenders.occupational_info: midwifery

lenders.name: Josephine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make dreams come true.

lenders.name: Geraldine
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner who struggled in the beginning and knows how it feels to need help.
lenders.occupational_info: I make identifying vests for dogs that are teamed with people to help them with disabilities, visiting the sick and lonely and search and rescue.

lenders.name: Chelsie
lenders.loan_because: We like world change. Thanks Oprah We Saw This On TV
lenders.occupational_info: We offer world change by way of comments on our powerful website to get a voice heard.

lenders.name: Veronica
lenders.loan_because: My father taught me to help those who are trying to help themselves

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: It is important to to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers at hospitals.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive change to the life of a person across the world.  To have that person know and realize that there are indeed others out there in our world who do truly care about them.

lenders.name: Jade
lenders.loan_because: My husband is started his own business.  I understand the struggles, frustrations, joys and determination that go with starting a business.  These people are dreaming and not letting anything stop them from going after their dreams.  I am sure their neighbors think they are crazy for dreaming so big.  But I don't!  Dream big and don't stop.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a housewife who stays at home with our baby.  I also go to college.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance really works to help improve people's lives, and that those of us who have more to share are obligated to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to teach people about the power of information.

lenders.name: Jane & George
lenders.occupation: RETIRED, RETAIL SUPERVISOR SALES AND OPERATIONS
lenders.loan_because: It is important for our Grandchildren to see how one person can make a difference by helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired from the jewelry industry but continue to stay busy by assisting in the high schools and frequently care for my Grandchildren.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: there is nothing better in life than to give back!

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I love.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a travel agent for scuba diving trips all over the world.

lenders.name: Jim Hall
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and would like to give back. I get much more than I give.
lenders.occupational_info: I am Vice President for Wisemar Consulting Firm in Charlotte, NC

lenders.name: Ed & Jean
lenders.loan_because: we care.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help in any small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I make routing maps on the computer for cable companies

lenders.name: wilma
lenders.loan_because: I'm thrilled to be able to make a significant, positive impact with even a small amount by our standards!
lenders.occupational_info: As a school social worker, I help to reduce the barriers between students and school success. Sometimes that means advocating for the family, providing psychotherapy, arrainging connections with comminity services, providing inservice training to teachers, whatever it takes to help kids be successful. I love it!

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I know through experience and faith that what I give is returned to me tenfold.
lenders.occupational_info: I have had many different jobs in my life, but recently I lost my job.  I most enjoy helping people.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I was very poor, with three daughters, and lost my home.  I needed help, but couldn't find anyone who would help.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a midwife for nearly 20 years, and deliver babies at home.

lenders.name: Valerija
lenders.loan_because: I'm very hapy what I can help
lenders.occupational_info: I'm very hapy!

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: My parents came from Mexico, and we understand the struggles in developing countries. We have also had access to resources and education only dreamt of by our ancestors.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel to countries like India, Brazil and Russia to start small factories that produce engine components.

lenders.name: Roberta
lenders.loan_because: i can!
lenders.occupational_info: i help others discern what God is doing in their lives.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Because Kiva is such a great idea.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I want to help our neighbors and friends and because somebody helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a community college.  I don't really have a job description.  I help keep our computers running and updated, I also help students enroll in college and help with their financial aid, regardless of where they attend.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people help themselves and by doing so hope it continues to be repeated.
lenders.occupational_info: a woman doing what most women do, caring for other people as well as myself and my family

lenders.name: Dee
lenders.loan_because: I can and I care.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: Even though I am on a fixed income  and do not have a lot of money coming in, I have much more than some people in other countries.
lenders.occupational_info: Before I retired, I worked for 25 years at a large hospital.  I was not a nurse.  I worked in the Admitting Dept and in other clerical positions.

lenders.name: Owen
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.occupational_info: I look at rocks and other data to make maps of the layers of earth below our feet so the comapny I work for can drill for oil.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Julie, RN
lenders.loan_because: I feel that it is my duty to help others with a hand up, not a hand out.

lenders.name: Tim and Lori
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance really works, and because we are in a position to help others in need.

lenders.name: A Mom
lenders.loan_because: Everyday my children are safe I want to share that blessing with others.  And if I can help someone to provide for their children then they to may feel blessed.

lenders.name: Kandi
lenders.loan_because: I thought it was a great idea and organization.  I think that everyone should give to others.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: it's a small way for me to help others.  As a woman with my own business, I want to encourage others to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I have 2 jobs........my first one involves helping students with learning problems.  My second job is that of teaching rubber stamping techniques and selling products made by Stampin' Up!

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I know that women have around the world have so much strength and desire to help their families, and all they need is a little help to flourish.

lenders.name: Brian & Marguerite
lenders.loan_because: Oprah's showcase of giving inspired us to reach out to people across the world to help them achieve their dreams, through modest means.
lenders.occupational_info: Brian is a residential architect (he designs houses) and Marguerite is a small animal veterinarian (she provides medical care for dogs and cats).

lenders.name: Cody
lenders.loan_because: I want to support other creative and ambitious women in the world.  I may not have much to loan, but feel privileged  to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I make people feel good by helping them look nice.  I make myself feel good by making pretty jewelry, pottery and crochet.

lenders.name: LaVonna
lenders.loan_because: There are only two ways of spreading light-to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.......

lenders.name: Bobby
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because:
What goes around, comes around. I believe that all men and women have the right to support themselves and their families with honor and dignity. 
"All Gods children need travelling shoes."  Maya Angelou
lenders.occupational_info:
When I'm not at home with my husband and two kids, I am at school trying to inspire my students to love writing, not fear or avoid it. I try to teach my kids that they all have an amazing story to tell, and I try to help them. get it down on paper. I teach each student to honor his or her own voice and style. Creative writing is subjective and the one-size-fits-all style of teaching it only leads these young writers to nod out in class or worse, freak out when faced with a blank page.
"No one is able to enjoy such feast than the one who throws a party in his own mind." 
Selma Lagerlöf

lenders.name: Donna and Graham
lenders.occupation: Computer Software Consultant & Wash Plant Operator
lenders.loan_because: I own my own business and can appreciate how difficult it can be to fund.  I also know how rewarding owning a business is.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.  Businesses use computer software to track the amount of business they do, how much people own them and how much they own others.  The software I work with helps business's track those numbers.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.occupation: Stay at home mom to three boys
lenders.loan_because: By chance, I was born in a country where most people don't have to struggle to put food on the table.  I feel an obligation to give others the same opportunity.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: At one time I didn't have much. Now I can give back to someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I transcribe  (type from tape recordings) for Self Realization Fellowship Church of all religions, inspirational talks and services given by Paramahansa Yogananda and SRF ministers. I have been transcribing for them for 35 years.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a direct difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Jim, Marta & Max
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to do so much good!
lenders.occupational_info: Jim taught high school math. Marta taught middle school health. Max taught us how to relax.

lenders.name: Tet
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who needs another chance at life...somebody who wants to make it better for themselves and for the community they live in.

lenders.name: Brooke
lenders.loan_because: I feel that the best way to make this world a better place is to give give give.
lenders.occupational_info: I am going to school to be a police officer

lenders.name: TEANA
lenders.loan_because: i want to make the difference in another persons life that is not as lucky as i am to have been born in the land of opportunity
lenders.occupational_info: i work in a casino- i watch many people gamble with money they dont have and loose. i feel sad for them but they do have a choice.

lenders.name: Jennifer Darocki
lenders.loan_because: I believe that dreams can come true with some hard work, some luck, and a little bit of kindness

lenders.name: Kluane
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others
lenders.occupational_info: Work on a computer all day.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: It is such a wonderful feeling to help others...pay it forward!!
lenders.occupational_info: I collect data for social research,which gives me the opportunity to meet a wide variety of people in all walks of life,and from every level of income.I LOVE this job!

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: Every penny helps to build and sustain small businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: Pharmaceutical R&D

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I have received many blessings in my life and feel a strong obligation to give back to my community and my world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired Physician's Assistant who now spends most of my free time volunteering for one thing or another.  I really enjoy working with Habitat for Humanity trying to eliminate poverty housing one family at a time.  Kiva.org fits into this philospophy of not being able to change everything, but absolutely being able to change SOMETHING!

lenders.name: Bridget
lenders.loan_because:
"To whom much is given, much is expected."

I have been blessed by others and by God so I'd like to pass that on in some way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wife and a mother of four kids, and I go to school part-time.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: Helping others in need is the right thing to do. I feel very blessed to be happily married and the mother of a beautiful baby girl. I also  feel very fortunate that I am able to work part-time so that I can spend more time with my family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a registered nurse for a company that focuses on patient education, wellness and prevention for people of all ages living with chronic illness.

lenders.name: kathie
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate and am grateful for what I have and want to be able to give an opportunity to someone else

lenders.name: Aubrey & Dana
lenders.loan_because: of the Indomitable Human Spirit

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: My Husband and I have been blessed in our business and we would like to give some of it to help  someone in need
lenders.occupational_info: We are a painting company. we paint exterior and interior of homes and businesses, We work together everyday and love it.

lenders.name: donie
lenders.loan_because: I like being part of the solution...and not part of the problem.  Working with others to help dreams come true is a very satisfying venture.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with people who have problems with thier accounts

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: Though I know what it is like to struggle financially, I have a pretty good life. I like to be able to help those who are less fortunate than me and are willing to work for their success.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: It makes a real difference in lives  of people throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: As a retired teacher, I currently volunteer as a Court Appointed Special Advocate (CASA), working for the best interest of children who are in the court system. I also volunteer at our local Humane Society and at my church.

lenders.name: Julienne
lenders.loan_because: I care :)
lenders.occupational_info: I do make-up for film & fashion and special effects!

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand in their life

lenders.name: S L
lenders.loan_because: I received help when I needed it -- now it's my turn.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: If I was in their position I would hope that they would do the same for me, and because I want to help those in need. In doing so, I hope that I am empowering people to be successful in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part time in a retail store where I sale computers, and other electronics while I go to school full time.

lenders.name: Bronwyn
lenders.loan_because: it gives me hope.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an organization that gives advice to the US government on how to provide better medical services to people.

lenders.name: Karlene
lenders.loan_because: I feel that if we are able to help others then we should.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I am working on starting a non profit organization to also assist others in need.

lenders.name: Kriston
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I are both educators.  We feel that by teaching the future leaders of our world we can help to make the future a better place for everyone.

lenders.name: Neal
lenders.loan_because: by doing so, I can reflect the love of Jesus to a total stranger.
lenders.occupational_info: I dispatch calls for service for five law enforcement agencies, seven fire departments and two ambulance districts.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: Day in/day out I work in an environment that's all about capital gain. I feel a huge need to make a difference in a person's life. I'm more and more concerned about the human condition rather than sales and revenue.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a liaison between our client and the creative team. I develop advertising strategy and lead a creative team for direct marketing.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: it's too easy and too important not to.
lenders.occupational_info: I design computer systems that make petroleum refineries work.

lenders.name: caryn
lenders.loan_because: I have been given much  so I too must give
lenders.occupational_info: social work, teacher, I love to sew

lenders.name: Marsha
lenders.loan_because: I respect hard work. I continue to build my business from the ground up and I am honoured to help someone else.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me ... and, I want to demonstrate God's love through the resources he has asked me to be accountable for. All the money I have is God's money ... I am simply a manager of what He gives me.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help families trying to better their lives and the lives of the children.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the education field.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: Anyone can make a difference.

lenders.name: Bill & Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: It makes us feel good to help others and 100% of the funds goes directly to the people who need them.
lenders.occupational_info: Both of us are financial professionals and understand a small business person's need for affordable capital.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: To help people who want to help themself.
lenders.occupational_info: I  write about Africa, a place of which I have great passion.  I have been fortunate enough to travel 13 African countries alone.  I am a better person each time I touch African soil!

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: Lilfe is too short to have to worry about unnecessary struggles. If we would all just give a little, it will affect the world tomorrow in such a huge way.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own an Auction House in a small town in Montana. We re-sale other people's stuff for a small commission.

lenders.name: Anu
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the best way to help a person is to enable the person to establish a way of life that they can be proud of and pass on to the future generations.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students who attend a university.

lenders.name: Kasey
lenders.loan_because: I care....
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mom of 2 sweet little girls. I have been married for 21 years..  I also LOVE taking pictures. I took this one on my page of the flower. It's one of my favorites! God Bless you!

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I love assisting in the success of women who have a passion to become independent, a desire to operate their own business and a vision to make a difference in their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently own and operate a home furnishings consignment business. I consign furniture and accessories from people who no longer need or want them and sell the items in my store to people that do need and want them. It's extremely rewarding and the ultimate in recycling.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: What is better than giving people money?  Making them give it back!
lenders.occupational_info: My occupation is jogging inside a large hamster wheel to generate power for a regional (and now socialized) financial institution.  I am paid in five pound blocks of expired government cheese.  I trade these for cigarettes which I subsequently sell to disabled veterans down at the docks.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I like to help small business' succeed
lenders.occupational_info: I look after computer networks and make them safe

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I respect people who have small businesses and I understand how difficult it is to keep it going. I like to help  people who are trying  to make a better life for themselves, their families, and their communities. I would like people all over the world to know that Americans are generous and caring people.
lenders.occupational_info: As a marketing professional I am a communicator who specializes in health care marketing. I develop ways for businesses to tell their customers about their business. Sometimes this takes the form of an ad, a brochure, a website, a radio commercial, or a letter that is mailed to customers.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: The money can be reused and reused to help people in diffrent palces
lenders.occupational_info: Just doing my job as a citizen of hte world

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes we all just need a little help from our friends. I want someone else in the world to feel successful!
lenders.occupational_info: I design and decorate sets for TV commercials. It's an incredible job, as I am freelance and get to work with different people & in different environments on a regular basis!

lenders.name: Nancy and Mike
lenders.loan_because: We want to help to promote independence
lenders.occupational_info: I am a physician and my wife is a musician and home maker

lenders.name: Stephanie and Max
lenders.loan_because: I loan not because I really can afford to, but because I want to; it makes me happy. If I could, I would loan thousands of dollars because it's the right thing to do. I see these faces - they humble me and speak to my heart. It's almost like having family members all across the world - and for me there's nothing like family.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I'm not clever enough to start my own business!
lenders.occupational_info: I cook in a bakery/deli in rural Minnesota.

lenders.name: Jeff,Holly,and children
lenders.loan_because: We want to help

lenders.name: Sebastian & DIego
lenders.loan_because: our parents want to teach us that helping one another will make the world better.  They make loans on our behalf.
lenders.occupational_info: our parents work for a major telecommunication company.  Sebastian and DIego spend their days laughing, playing, and napping.

lenders.name: linda from Indiana
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone who is trying to better himself and who has a clear idea of how to do that.  I can  help with some of the money needs. needed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired foreign language teacher.

lenders.name: Pat & Denise
lenders.loan_because: God has given us so much here in the USA. It Is a blessing to share some of ourselves with those less fortunate.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place and I love people from all walks of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I make the pages that you visit on the internet and help you find them in search engines.

lenders.name: Liane
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life by people who believe in me.  I believe people who want to improve should be given the opportunity to improve without having to beg or plead.  Afterall, we are all brothers and sisters on this planet and in this lifetime.  Nothing feels better than unconditional love and support!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 9 and 10 year olds math, spelling, science, the history of California, and how to read for deeper enjoyment and understanding!

lenders.name: Ron & Joanna
lenders.occupation: Regional Sales Manager & Human Services Manager
lenders.loan_because: We feel strongly about empowering  people to pursue their dreams!  We also what to give individuals the opportunity to support their families!  Everyone deserves a chance!  Best of luck and much success to all the wonderful businesses that will be started through Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am the Manager of Employment Programs for Easter Seals Crossroads.  This organization is a community resource working in partnership with children and adults with disabilities or special needs and their families to promote growth, independence and dignity. 

My husband is a North American Sales Manager for a Taiwanese Wire and Cable Company.

lenders.name: Angeliki
lenders.loan_because: I want to help her and help her children.
lenders.occupational_info: 4th grade student

lenders.name: Carole
lenders.loan_because: My life is blessed in so many ways and I feel certain that sharing is the right thing to do.  In order to receive I must give!!!
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to ensure that no one ends their life afraid, alone and in pain

lenders.name: Flame
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to work.      I would like to help others have an easier life and donate an hour of my work.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a nurse, who works in a nursing home, and cares for 30 older people.
 In my free time, I volunteer for Red Cross and I am also a CASA worker.

lenders.name: Bette & Jan
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: There is such a great need in the world.  The Good Lord has blessed me abundantly and my hearts  desire is to bless someone else in realizing their dreams for themselves as well as their family. My hope is that  those whom I have blessed through God, they in turn will be a blessing to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Restaurant Industry and I am a waitress/server. I deal with the general public in making sure you have a pleasurable dining experience and meal.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I should. What else? Well, as the US economy collapses under the brunt of bad lending practices, microloans inspire me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a toy company and make the signs for their stores.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to be a blessing to others.

lenders.name: Kayt
lenders.loan_because: I have always enjoyed helping others when ever I can.

lenders.name: Lesley
lenders.loan_because: need to give back

lenders.name: Karyn
lenders.loan_because: it's only right to share our bounty with those who are less fortunate. We are all citizens of the same planet, regardless of what country we call home.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the day-to-day operations of a fundraising office in the College of Arts and Sciences at a large research university.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams and make a better life for them and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a hotel and manage the Catering Department in Sales and planning of weddings and other special events.

lenders.name: Pravin
lenders.loan_because: some guy called Gandhi said "Poverty is the worst form of violence". So me no want violence.

lenders.name: Siobhan
lenders.occupation: Wife & Mother of 2 & Car Wash owner
lenders.loan_because:
I like the idea of global helpfulness.
Let's help everyone be successful and we will be successful...
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just like you working hard to raise loving, caring, smart human beings.

lenders.name: Miguel
lenders.loan_because: i've never done something like this before. i hope it helps.
lenders.occupational_info: manage a hospital laboratory

lenders.name: Silvia
lenders.loan_because: Because its better to give than to recieve
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Graphic Designer

lenders.name: L Danyetta
lenders.loan_because: I love making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others achieve their personal, leadership and business goals.

lenders.name: Viorica
lenders.loan_because: As a woman living an extremely fortunate lifestyle, I feel it is my duty to help other women support themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Anything I can do to make a difference in the life of someone else brings joy to me, too.  I want to loan primarily to people living in Mexico because most of my students come from Mexico and I know how difficult life there can be.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children who are English language learners.  I speak Spanish and am able to be a bilingual teacher to my bilingual English/Spanish speakers.  I LOVE my job!  I get to teach, make a daily difference, be an advocate and a revolutionary!  I am so lucky.

lenders.name: Acacia
lenders.loan_because: It is a very effective way to help a person help himself/herself.  Hopefully, extreme poverty can be eliminated one person at a time.  I also sponsor children in the third world countries hoping it will help children there break the poverty cycle.
lenders.occupational_info: I do project control. My main responsibilities includes handling the financials/forecasting/reporting of a large project team, business control matters, etc.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: Price is right wholesale is an on-line clothing store, that provides quality name brand items at affordable prices.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea that I can dramatically impact the life of someone with a relatively small amount of money.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that rents heavy construction equipment to companies who only need it for a short time.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I know first-hand how much it helps.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend school at a university in North Carolina. I'm majoring in Spanish and minoring in Psychology. I love learning different languages and I also like to work at the dry cleaners. I have many wonderful customers that I see each week. I love the advice they give me.

lenders.name: Jim Stewart
lenders.loan_because: Those with the most must help those with the least.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Because I believe that raising a family is hard work and that sometimes you just need a little help to have a happy, healthy family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a bookstore part-time, and I am a hands-on grandmother.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because:
Everyone at some point in their life has had help achieving a dream...I want to give back in honor of those who helped me make my dream a reality.
"Dream as though you'll live forever, Live as if you'll die today"
lenders.occupational_info: I care for those who need medical attention

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I receive happiness from helping other people unconditionally.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate workers to build homes for rich people.

lenders.name: Eddie & Elaine
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy the excitement of providing opportunities for those who want to improve their lives as well as their communities.
lenders.occupational_info:
He: Works at a University School of Medicine
She: Works for a doctor

lenders.name: Andrew and Julie
lenders.loan_because: I love the direct effect i can have on someone else's life!

lenders.name: Tekla
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate to live in a country with free healthcare, a social service system which helps people when they are in need, a banking system that will loan money when you need it and even if you do not.  The public school system is free through high school and if you cannot afford to go to University you can get grants and loans. In Canada we find fault with those systems and complain about what is wrong with them instead of appreciating what is right about them. We are only limited by the effort we want to put into our lives to better them. I think it is our obligation to share our good fortune.

lenders.name: brian
lenders.loan_because: I think that we all have a gift to give, and if that gift is helping another person have a better life, we gain more than we will ever give!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people do things that they sometimes think are too hard or too complicated.  I help people with technology.

lenders.name: Shelli
lenders.loan_because: Individuals around the world deserve the trust and availability of money that will make their lives a little bit easier. Also, I feel like I am making a differene in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: In my job I analyze financial information and help my team make decisions about loaning other companies money.

lenders.name: Noreen
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to succeed.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to take care of their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a nurse and a mother

lenders.name: Carole
lenders.loan_because: I can... and wish more people would
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Special Education teacher and take great pleasure in being able to help those who need just a little extra support to "make it" in this world.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I want poverty to become history and if loaning $25.00 will make a difference in someone elses life, I am thankful I can be a apart of that change.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to!

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: Im a seamstess also and want to help any woman who is in need of money for sewing clothes or etc...
lenders.occupational_info: I opened a small business in Tx and I sew alot and I make great gifts

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: a small loan can transform a whole family's life and future.  It gives me great joy  to aid families around the world in fulfilling their dreams for a  livelihood and better life for themselves and their children.

lenders.name: antoinette
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people
lenders.occupational_info: retired after 27 years with at&t.  own a property management company and in process of opening a transitional home for girls

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I firmly believe that we have to "give back" some of the benefits we have.  I am fortunate to lack nothing--so I should help others who have need.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach writing to first year college students.

lenders.name: SHAHNAZ
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Alex Morgan
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to people who really could use my money.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freshman in college, studying English and Political Science.  I plan on going to Law School, and hopefully making a positive impact on this world.

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: to give someone a chance
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital

lenders.name: carrie
lenders.loan_because: You never realize how good you have things, until you learn of someone that nedds just a few dollars to change their life.

lenders.name: E.Ita
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we all need a little help from our friends.

lenders.name: Victoria J
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at being self-sufficient and the opportunity to achieve.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are working to better there lives.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I want my children to learn generosity by seeing it in action.  And faith without works is dead.
lenders.occupational_info: I am married, with two young children.  I want my children to know there is a big world beyond our borders, and it is full of wonderful people.

lenders.name: Kristie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone else's life.  God has given  me a chance to help someone and I feel it is my responsibility to lend a hand to help a person who needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that distributes medical products to hospitals.  As a  medcial sales rep I work with laboratories in hospitals to make sure they receive the medical products they ordered to use in the lab.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I heard about this on Oprah -- what a great idea!  I lived in Liberia as a child, so I'm honored to help someone in a nearby country to build a business!

lenders.name: Venesha
lenders.loan_because: I can remember the times when 25$ made all the difference in the world for my family. When I was a small child my father served time in jail because another man became violent towards my mother and my father defended her. Unfortunetly my father hurt that man and was found guilty of assult. My mother was expecting her 2nd child, my little sister at that time. My father had been our primary provider. We had nothing. It was because so many people gave to us that we were able to survive. I will never forget those simple acts of kindness.
lenders.occupational_info: As a nurse I care for those who can no longer care for themselves. It is draining work, yes. But when my patients or their families thank me for the care I have given, that thanks is all the reward I could ever ask for.

lenders.name: jerri
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help.  I am especially wanting to loan money to people to start their own businesses.  This is a wonderful program.I am so glad I found it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am now retired.  I have 15 grandchildren 3 of which are great grandchildren.  I am so blessed. by them

lenders.name: denise
lenders.loan_because: It is what I can do to help another person.

lenders.name: Patti ANDERSEN
lenders.loan_because: I want to help  single or widowed women who are trying to survive the best they can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach the "nuts and bolts" of entertainment in Hollywood: how to make a living in "show biz" in front or behind the camera

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: Because I am a human being.  I feel that everyone should have a chance to do great things!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because:
I like spreading my good luck to women in other countries.

Be well.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an electrical engineer, laying out computer chips that go into copy/scanner/fax machines.

lenders.name: Greta
lenders.loan_because: I know the need to want to make your life better and sometimes all you need is for someone else to believe in you!
lenders.occupational_info: I sing, I paint, I make music and films, anything that makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.occupational_info: I am a corporate trainer and a college professor.  I teach technology and computer classes.

lenders.name: Mark and Jessica
lenders.loan_because: We feel very lucky for our lives.   We want to help people around the world achieve their dreams!

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I heard about this organization on the Oprah show and my immediate reaction was - "what a cool thing to do".  I enjoy helping people however I can and if this is one way that I can give back to the world and help someone in the process - I love it!  I'm impressed with the number of people who are trying to establish their own business.  I would love to do that some day, but never thought it possible - but perhaps, maybe someday I will.  This is very inspirational!
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves engaging and partnering with individuals and groups every day.  I manage all of our supervisory, leadership and management training.  As well, I help organizations become more effective through providing organization development support.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: it is a small thing that can have a big impact!!

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful that through some hard-work, life has been good to me.  I hope that by being a member of Kiva I can help someone else get ahead in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the Finance and Administration for an HIV Research Center

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: Because we are blessed.  When we were struggling, Christian friends  helped us & now we are able to  bless someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a home educator to our teenage son.   We choose to keep our son at home and teach him our own family values.

lenders.name: Cindy and Bruce
lenders.loan_because: To help others realize their dreams and better their quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: Education

lenders.name: Kathlene
lenders.occupational_info: Helping businesses to optimize their process operations to provide products while being environmentally responsible.

lenders.name: Josie630
lenders.loan_because: I would hope someone would help me, if need be.
lenders.occupational_info: Blessed

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: When you bless others, you always receive more blessings in return. The true value of giving is knowing your gift has given value to the life of another.
lenders.occupational_info: I do all I can to protect our earth and bring love to all.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their full potential and help them become successful in life.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is challengeing and rewarding.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the mission of KIVA.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with disadvantaged youth.

lenders.name: LATASHA
lenders.loan_because: I love helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a home-based business in which I design custom products for other home-based and small business owners such as business cards, postcards, forms, other printed material that will help them promote their businesses without spending a lot of money.

lenders.name: Kari
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the idea of "paying it forward"  to those who might need a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Finance Manager at a car dealership and a Certified Interior Redesigner

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I want to see businesses do as well as I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I plan and organize events and parties for businesses

lenders.name: Laura G.
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Sunnie Austin-Sellers
lenders.loan_because: helping people help themselves - the true gift of giving

lenders.name: ron and family
lenders.loan_because: The true dividend from giving is knowing that you've made a difference --  a few dollars at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I help design and build data centers that house thousands of computers which run applications for a global investment bank.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people succeed!  I also lost a precious pet of mine, and I needed to give back for all the wonderful years of joy he gave us.  It makes me feel good inside.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people in travel plans over the internet.  They can travel by plane, car, cruise ship.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: this is a WONDERFUL way to change the life of someone
lenders.occupational_info: When storms hit my country and cause widespread devestation, I go to the site to help people

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I know that there have been times in the lives of myself, my mother and my friends that a small amount of money would have made a huge difference.  It gives me great pleasure to invest in someone else and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I work for a company that rents and sells equipment to construction companies.  My job is to make everything run smoothly in the office, so that the shop and the salesman can concentrate on their jobs.

lenders.name: cathy
lenders.loan_because: I like to empower women to prosper through  running thier own business.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Karina
lenders.loan_because: "The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches, but to reveal to him his own."

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I'm so lucky & I want to change someone else's luck & watch them soar!
lenders.occupational_info: I love making art and I work in retail,so I'd like to help women who enjoy those things too.

lenders.name: Bailey Road Kitty
lenders.loan_because: sometimes all someone needs is a chance.

lenders.name: Beverlee
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed with spiritual abudance in my life, I want to share my blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired because of the Multiple Sclerosis.

lenders.name: Vern
lenders.loan_because: It's a great idea and program.  Spread the wealth!

lenders.name: Coop
lenders.loan_because: i've been blessed.

lenders.name: margaret
lenders.loan_because: "Feeling bad" for others does not change anything. Compassion and action does.

lenders.name: Emilie
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise funding for an art museum.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: Traveling to West Africa many times has changed my perspective on so many aspects of life.  I have seen firsthand the conditions in which people work each day to be self sufficient and to provide for their families - especially in the rural areas.  They need the support of people from the rest of the world to improve their lives.   Despite this, so many people are friendly, proud and hopeful and so interested in bettering their lives and the lives of their families.  My family and I are very fortunate to live as we do, and I want to give something to others to help them achieve better lives.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.occupation: owner of a dog waste removal service

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: Pay it forward
lenders.occupational_info: Finance

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I CAN

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I'm so impressed with how many people take the initiative to start their own businesses.  I'm also impressed by the wide variety of businesses out there.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in sales for a software company.  I visit customers to discuss the technical capabilities of our software.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to dream about starting a business and lacking funds.  Just want to help someone else realize their dream.

lenders.name: Katy
lenders.loan_because: This is how we change the world for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the associate director for a non-profit social services agency in Minnesota serving men, women and children in crisis.

lenders.name: cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I've been very fortunate in my life and always give back to others in need.  Its a warm feeling to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I was in banking and real estate for 15 years. Good people gave me chances and I worked very hard to be successful...

lenders.name: Marlene
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help.  We all need help at some point in our lives.  It feels good to know that you don't have to be rich to help.

lenders.name: Keith, Allyson & Family
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed with the life I have and would like to help others feel the same way!

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: this is such a great thing to do!

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I am a home care agent for the elderly

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed, and I like to share my blessings!
lenders.occupational_info: I create documents, guides and training for my company.

lenders.name: Amber and MJ
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I own a business and know the power of someone believing in you enough to loan to your dream. We have been given so much and to whom much is given much is expected! We also want our daughter to grow up giving, and this is a great way for her to participate and learn about other people's way of life!

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: I admire people in business that are trying to make in difference in their lives. I have struggled for many years to start my own business; it's still a dream in progress.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach fitness exercises to groups with osteoporosis or injuries, these exercises are specialized movements which helps the groups to use their joints and bones better in their daily lives.

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.loan_because: This is the best feeling ever!!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find and sell their homes

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: Opportunities to get ahead abound in the U.S.  We have many safety nets and social services available to those who are struggling.  Kiva allows me to provide that same opportunity to those living in countries that don't provide such blessings!

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to make capital available to folks who might otherwise not have access to it. Plus, I love the fact that each donation becomes revolving capital to reinvest over and over again. KIVA is now my go-to gift idea - truly, a gift that keeps on giving!

lenders.name: TONYA
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense. Not only does it make sense, it provides me with an opportunity to give of what I have to change someone else's life. That's a GREAT feeling!
lenders.occupational_info: My job as a Public Health Educator is to protect, promote, and preserve the health of the world's people. I study the social, economic, political, and cultural dynamics that impact the overall health of the world.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone less fortunate to better themselves and to live their dreams.

lenders.name: Daria
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy lending a hand-up to others in our global community.  I appreciate that Kiva gives me a chance to share.  This organization makes it fun and easy.
lenders.occupational_info: retired teacher

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: i understand the power of giving, and the importance of the unselfish act.
lenders.occupational_info: i help review and write legal contracts for people and businesses.

lenders.name: kasey
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should be afforded the oppertunity to live a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a store selling cell phones

lenders.name: ANDY
lenders.loan_because: I simply feel that helping others is the only true way to enrich ones own purpose and spirit in life. To be able to give to people you don't know, to make a difference in some dark corner of the world, to contribute to some small measure of improvement in an isolated place that someone calls home, is to me - the ultimate statement of humanity,   kindness and love.
lenders.occupational_info:
I design, configure and build backbone fiber-optic networks that provide Internet & private communications to millions of users across the United States and around the world. (Cisco CCIE Engineer)

Hobbies:
travel, photography & enjoying life! :)
(Routing packets is fun!)

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to have a wonderful start to my career.  I believe that those with an entrepreneurial spirit deserve a chance, and can truly change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large retailer.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: I want others to have a productive, self-supported life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an administrator at a medical school.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I believe a helping hand is a good way for peace and understanding between countries.  I believe in helping people be independent.

lenders.name: Craig and Judy
lenders.loan_because: We want to enable families to support themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We develop software for health care facilities.

lenders.name: Maurice
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish, and you feed him for a day.  Teach him to fish, and give him the tools to succeed, and you feed him for life.
lenders.occupational_info: I either drive the ambulance, or am in the back of the ambulance caring for the patient, when someone needs to go to a hospital in my community.  I do emergency care and transportation of the sick or injured.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I write fiction stories -- I've had short stories published and have just completed a full length manuscript.

lenders.name: Lene
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed in my life, I have more, than I could  have wished for as a child. Life's been good to my family and I. How could I not loan, if I'm lucky enough to be able too?
lenders.occupational_info: I love, what I do! Everyday is different. I design floral decor on some days, gardens and homes on others.

lenders.name: Lavon
lenders.loan_because: It's an opportunity to assist someone that needs and appreciates the help.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: What a great way to help someone!! You can actually see that if just a handful of people give just a little bit, lives can change!!  I'll be giving more!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell print music to schools and churches.  Music brings people together emotionally.  It's the universal language.

lenders.name: Bev
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people and am able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children with disabilities learn.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.occupation: past president and owner real estate management fi

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.

lenders.name: christina
lenders.loan_because: Regardless of financial status I believe everyone has a moral obligation to reach out and touch one life at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I do what I believe God intended me to do I take care of and offer comfort and compassion to the sick.

lenders.name: Lunaria
lenders.loan_because: it feels good. :)
lenders.occupational_info: Ive been gainfully employed with the US Postal Service for well over a decade now. I dont think that my job is much to brag about but I am very grateful to have it . My job has enabled me to provide a respectable lifestyle and standard of living for myself and my son. Im proud of the life and little world Ive created for us. I think Ive done a pretty good job and it is only because of where I work that Ive been able to do as well as I have.

lenders.name: roger
lenders.loan_because: I want to help empower others who work hard to earn a living and support their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange financing for home purchases in the San Francisco Bay area of California, USA

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate to have the money to help to others.  If I can help others to make a better life, then I should do so.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: I am educated; I can provide for myself and my family; I can own property; I can vote; I have running water, plenty of food and a comfortable and safe place to lay my head at night.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others succeed as no one achieves their goals in life without help and support from one another. We are connected in profound ways and need to honor the gifts in others!
lenders.occupational_info: I both paint and write to express inspiration, joy, peace and contemplation in a world that often moves too quickly for our soul to process. My art and poems hope  to give people a place to both rest and renew.
